TopicTitle: orginizing in chronological order and naming of Photos and video?

Articles.Content: Any tips or programs that copy your photos and videos and put them in chronological order and make names for them?
All my photos are archived on my main Linux box, and after importing each new batch from my camera(s) I use [exiv2](http://www.exiv2.org/manpage.html) to rename each image to its date/time taken.
